Instructions: Participants were asked to quickly respond when the target was presented by pressing a mouse button with their right hand.
TaskDescription: Subjects participated in visual "oddball" paradigm. Five empty squares were presented constantly with the location to attend to marked by a green outline. Filled white disks appeared briefly inside one of the five empty squares. Participants responded to the target by pressing a mouse button with their right hand when the white disk appeared in the attended location.
